Uses of Interface
i2p.susi.util.Buffer

  • Packages that use Buffer 
    Package Description
    i2p.susi.util  
    i2p.susi.webmail
    The SusiMail webapp, which implements a webmail interface, POP3 and SMTP client-side protocols, and local caching of email.
    i2p.susi.webmail.encoding  
    i2p.susi.webmail.pop3  

    • Uses of Buffer in i2p.susi.util

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FileBuffer
      File implementation of Buffer.
      class  GzipFileBuffer
      Gzip File implementation of Buffer.
      class  MemoryBuffer
      Buffer backed by a byte array.
      class  OutputStreamBuffer
      Output only.
      class  ReadBuffer
      Input only for constant data, initialized from a byte array.
